page.title: 15School Sports in Skegness
page.content: On Wednesday 17th July 1985 it was Sports' Day. The afternoon came very quickly. All of the children in the school took part. Each class went on to the field led by a banner with their class number on. It was a lovely day and parents watched as the children raced. First were the flat races and everyone cheered and waved their mascots in the air. It went on through the afternoon, everyone running their race until the last one had been run. After that everyone crowded round while P.C.Gill,The Community Policeman, presented the trophies. Our class won a trophy for beating the other fourth year classes. After the presentations we helped to clear away the chairs that the parents had been sitting on. Everyone had enjoyed Sports' Day.
